fr.univ.lille1.site

Interface SiteItf

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SiteImpl

    public interface SiteItf
extends java.rmi.Remote
    This interface define a site node. A site node is defind by an id, his father and sons. A node can send and receive message from different node in the hierarchy
    Author:
    Durigneux Antoine, Dupont Clï¿½ment

                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException

        child - An array of site node, all sons

        java.rmi.RemoteException

               throws java.rmi.RemoteException

      • receiveMessage

        void receiveMessage(SiteItf initiator,
                  byte[] message)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method is used in order to receive message from another site node
        Parameters:
        initiator - The site node that create the message and send it to this site node
        message - The message that we receive
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • sendMessageToSite

        void sendMessageToSite(java.lang.String siteId,
                     byte[] message)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method is used in order to send a message to a node that is not a father / son of this node. It looks for the particlar node in the registry
        Parameters:
        siteId - The site id that we want to send a message to
        message - The message that we send
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
